nodeMetric.field_description: Page Likes is a count of the number of people who have liked your page. Page Likes by Country is the count of Page Likes, segmented by country.

body.summary: Page Likes is a count of the number of people who have liked your page. Page Likes by Country is the count of Page Likes, segmented by country.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Page Likes, which is mostly applicable to social platforms, counts the number of unique visitors who have liked your page.
Page Likes by Demographic is the count of the number of people who have liked your page, segmented by age and gender.
Page Unlikes is a count of the number of people who have unliked your page.
